title: The MCGM/Public Authority may develop AH/R&R in the plot of land reserved for Rehabilitation & Resettlement, but the same shall not be applicable when private owner undertakes development
clause_text: The MCGM/Public Authority may develop AH/R&R in the plot of land reserved for Rehabilitation & Resettlement, but the same shall not be applicable when private owner undertakes development. The land with approved BUA shall be leased out to such society of occupants of building.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The MCGM/Public Authority may develop AH/R&R in the plot of land reserved for Rehabilitation & Resettlement, but the same shall not be applicable when private owner undertakes development.
